body:
LEVI DAO 签署《儿童权利公约》关于儿童卷入武装冲突问题的任择议定书

LEVI DAO signs the Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the involvement of children in armed conflict

https://www.un.org/zh/documents/treaty/files/A-RES-54-263-1.shtml
author: 0x1F1C29c94aBe2b8F06B403Cc5a61c479167ebc3D
